column3: Investigation Stage (Col. 3) - Cases Pending Investigation from Previous Year
column4: Investigation Stage (Col. 4) - Cases Reported During the Year
column5: Investigation Stage (Col. 5) - Cases Withdrawn by Govt. During Investigation
column6: Investigation Stage (Col. 6) - Cases not Investigated or Investigation was Refused
column7: Investigation Stage (Col. 7) - Cases Declared False on Account of Mistake of Fact or Law
column8: Investigation Stage (Col. 8) - Cases in Which ChargeSheets were Submitted
column9: Investigation Stage (Col. 9) - Cases in Which Final Report Submitted
column10: Investigation Stage (Col. 10) - Total True Cases = Col. (8 + 9)
column11: Investigation Stage (Col. 11) - Cases Pending Investigation at the end of the Year
column12: Trial Stage (Col. 12) - Cases Pending Trial from Previous Year
column13: Trial Stage (Col. 13) - Cases Sent for Trial During the Year
column14: Trial Stage (Col. 14) - Cases Withdrawn by Govt. During Trial
column15: Trial Stage (Col. 15) - Total Cases for Trial During the Year
column16: Trial Stage (Col. 16) - Cases Compounded or Withdrawn
column17: Trial Stage (Col. 17) - Cases in which Trials were Completed
column19: Trial Stage (Col. 19) - Cases Acquitted or Discharged
column20: Trial Stage (Col. 20) - Cases Pending Trial at the end of the Year
